content.text: Match ends, Sunderland 1, West Bromwich Albion 1.
Second Half ends, Sunderland 1, West Bromwich Albion 1.
Attempt missed. Jermain Defoe (Sunderland) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Patrick van Aanholt from a direct free kick.
Jonny Evans (West Bromwich Albion) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Jonny Evans (West Bromwich Albion).
Duncan Watmore (Sunderland) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
